Bloated monstrosity is a monster spawned after a crystal is destroyed by Taraket the Necromancer during the battle with him. While it is alive, Taraket's auto-attacks will increase in damage.

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • Dextrous Crystal ( 20) – Defeat Taraket the Necromancer while the bloated monstrosity is still alive.
  • Tank and Spank ( 40) – Defeat Taraket the Necromancer while both the bloated monstrosity and corpse carrier are still alive.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 11 April 2023 (Update):
    • Updated Undead Slayer categories gamewide.
  • update 25 February 2019 (Update):
    • Added to game.
